Tool

NameDownslope Area
ID5
Author(c) 2001 by O.Conrad
Specificationgrid, interactive

Description

This interactive module allows you to specify source cells (with a left mouse click), for which the downslope area shall be identified. For the 'Deterministic Infinity' and 'Multiple Flow Direction' algorithms, which are able to simulate flow divergence, the result will give the percentage of the source cell's flow that drains through each cell.
